column4: Microsoft offers wide range of cloud services from UK datacenters
column5: LONDON Microsoft Corp is introducing a complete set of cloud services from data centers in Britain  its second biggest market for cloud-based software after the United States  as demand for data localization spreads across Europe and around the world.

column4: CORRECTED-Microsoft offers wide range of cloud services from UK datacentres
column5: LONDON  Sept 7 Microsoft Corp is introducing a complete set of cloud services from data centres in Britain  its second biggest market for cloud-based software after the United States  as demand for data localisation spreads across Europe and around the world.

column4: Tesla gets $300 million lease credit line from Deutsche Bank
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Tesla Motors Inc  said on Wednesday it had entered into an agreement with Deutsche Bank whereby the electric car maker can borrow up to $300 million for its vehicle leasing program  part of a broader effort to bolster the company's finances.

column4: Intel to spin out cybersecurity unit  sell stake in business to TPG
column5: Sept 7 Intel Corp said it would spin out its cybersecurity division and sell a majority stake in it to investment firm TPG for $3.1 billion in cash.

column4: BRIEF-Intel and TPG to collaborate to establish McAfee as a cybersecurity company valued at $4.2 bln
column5: * Intel and TPG to collaborate to establish McAfee as leading independent cybersecurity company valued at $4.2 billion
